name: mrbayes
publications: Huelsenbeck, J. P. and F. Ronquist. 2001. MRBAYES: Bayesian inference of phylogeny. Bioinformatics 17:754-755.
Ronquist, F. and J. P. Huelsenbeck. 2003. MRBAYES 3: Bayesian phylogenetic inference under mixed models. Bioinformatics 19:1572-1574.
Ronquist, F. et al. 2012. MRBAYES 3.2: Efficient Bayesian phylogenetic inference and model selection across a large model space. Syst Biol. May 2012; 61(3): 539-542.
Altekar, G., S. Dwarkadas, J. P. Huelsenbeck, and F. Ronquist. 2004. Parallel Metropolis-coupled Markov chain Monte Carlo for Bayesian phylogenetic inference. Bioinformatics 20:407-415.
description: A program for the Bayesian estimation of phylogeny
